title: Ticket #3952: Add grid-type gce to the gridmanager
description: Add a new GCE (Google Compute Engine) grid-type to the grid universe, similar to the existing EC2 grid-type.
check_ins:
2014-Feb-17 14:52   Check-in [39427]: last details of doc for new gce grid type #3952 (By Karen Miller )
2014-Feb-17 13:00   Check-in [39425]: Edit and complete documentation of new gce grid type. #3952 (By Karen Miller )
2014-Feb-04 16:11   Check-in [39315]: Docs for new grid-type gce. #3952 (By Jaime Frey )
2014-Feb-04 15:55   Check-in [39314]: Add param defaults for GCE GAHP. #3952 (By Jaime Frey )
2014-Jan-30 13:33   Check-in [39271]: Build proper GCE default network interface name. #3952 (By Jaime Frey )
2014-Jan-30 13:25   Check-in [39270]: Modify the syntax for GCE metadata to be less Condor-specific. #3952 The gahp shouldn't have to understand Condor's goofy syntax for specifying environment variables. (By Jaime Frey )
2013-Nov-26 14:19   Check-in [39269]: Improve cancelation code for gce jobs in the gridmanager. #3952 (By Jaime Frey )
2013-Nov-26 14:17   Check-in [39268]: Simplify threading code in the gce_gahp. #3952 Remove unneeded code from when there were many fine-grained locks. (By Jaime Frey )
2013-Nov-21 16:16   Check-in [38814]: Support setting of metadata in the gce_gahp. #3952 Metadata can be set directly in the submit file or in a seperate file, similar to EC2 user data. The formatting is different, as GCE metadata is ascii key/value pairs. Metadata given in the submit file via gce_metadata is formatted identically to the [...] (By Jaime Frey )
2013-Nov-11 16:58   Check-in [38699]: Wait for asynchronous requests to finish in gce_gahp. #3952 Some requests in GCE return immediately, before the operation has taken place. The response includes a handle that can be used to check the status of the operation later. Instance creation and deletion work this way. The gce_gahp now waits for [...] (By Jaime Frey )
2013-Nov-11 16:53   Check-in [38698]: Reduce copying with ParseLine() in gce_gahp. #3952 (By Jaime Frey )
2013-Nov-08 15:39   Check-in [38135]: Minor fixes to GCE code to build on all platforms. #3952 (By Jaime Frey )
2013-Nov-07 14:34   Check-in [38125]: Use OAuth 2.0 service to get necessary credentials. #3952 Instead of assuming the auth file has a bare access token, we now expect to have a refresh token and related data, formatted in JSON as generated by the gcutil command-line tool. We use that information to obtain an access token from Google's [...] (By Jaime Frey )
2013-Nov-07 14:29   Check-in [38124]: House cleaning around the gce_gahp. #3952 * Remove unnecessary includes * Consolidate some files * Import some std:: classes into global namespace (By Jaime Frey )
2013-Nov-06 11:40   Check-in [38101]: Gridmanager changes for GCE. Now we can submit and cancel jobs. #3952 * Start ignoring instance id, which isn't very useful. (By Jaime Frey )
2013-Oct-23 11:45   Check-in [38099]: Initial code to implement a new gce grid universe type. #3952 (By Jaime Frey )
